article_title: Franklin’s new principal coming back to his roots

article_metadata.description: FRANKLIN — It’s never easy to walk away from a comfortable job. But that’s exactly what Adam Boettcher, Franklin Public School’s new 7-12 principal and high school athletic director did. After serving as an elementary principal at Stapleton Public Schools for seven years, he decided to get back to the Franklin area.
